item.title: Are AI Detectors Good Enough? A Survey on Quality of Datasets With Machine-Generated Texts
item.description: AI-generated text detectors struggle in real-world scenarios due to flawed evaluation datasets; this study proposes robust methods to evaluate these datasets and improve detector reliability.

item.title: BiGR: Harnessing Binary Latent Codes for Image Generation and Improved Visual Representation Capabilities
item.description: BiGR: a novel image generation model unifying generation and discrimination using compact binary codes, achieving superior performance and enabling zero-shot generalization across various vision tasks…

item.title: How Do Training Methods Influence the Utilization of Vision Models?
item.description: Training methods dramatically alter which neural network layers are crucial for decision-making, revealing how different training strategies impact model efficiency and functionality.

item.title: Montessori-Instruct: Generate Influential Training Data Tailored for Student Learning
item.description: MONTESSORI-INSTRUCT: A novel data synthesis framework tailors synthetic training data to student learning preferences, significantly improving student language model performance.

item.title: NaturalBench: Evaluating Vision-Language Models on Natural Adversarial Samples
item.description: NaturalBench: A new VLM benchmark reveals critical weaknesses and enables continuous evaluation using naturally-occurring adversarial samples.

item.title: Teaching Models to Balance Resisting and Accepting Persuasion
item.description: LLMs can be taught to both resist harmful and accept helpful persuasion, improving accuracy and teamwork.

item.title: DAWN: Dynamic Frame Avatar with Non-autoregressive Diffusion Framework for Talking Head Video Generation
item.description: DAWN generates realistic talking-head videos at high speed using a novel non-autoregressive diffusion model, exceeding prior methods in quality and efficiency.

item.title: Diffusion Curriculum: Synthetic-to-Real Generative Curriculum Learning via Image-Guided Diffusion
item.description: Image-guided diffusion models create a synthetic-to-real data spectrum for curriculum learning, boosting long-tail classification and low-quality image learning.

item.title: DPLM-2: A Multimodal Diffusion Protein Language Model
item.description: DPLM-2, a new multimodal protein model, simultaneously generates protein sequences and 3D structures, improving upon previous separate-modality approaches.

item.title: FiTv2: Scalable and Improved Flexible Vision Transformer for Diffusion Model
item.description: FiTv2, an enhanced vision transformer, generates high-resolution images with diverse aspect ratios, exceeding existing models in speed and resolution adaptability.

item.title: Looking Inward: Language Models Can Learn About Themselves by Introspection
item.description: LLMs can learn about themselves through introspection, outperforming other models in predicting their own behavior, as demonstrated by experiments with GPT-4 and other LLMs.

item.title: MagicTailor: Component-Controllable Personalization in Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: MagicTailor empowers text-to-image models with component-level control, enabling precise visual concept personalization.

item.title: SeerAttention: Learning Intrinsic Sparse Attention in Your LLMs
item.description: SeerAttention learns attention sparsity, boosting LLMs’ efficiency and scalability via a learnable gate and customized FlashAttention, achieving near-lossless accuracy with high sparsity.

item.title: UCFE: A User-Centric Financial Expertise Benchmark for Large Language Models
item.description: UCFE benchmark dynamically evaluates LLMs’ financial expertise via human-aligned, multi-round interactions, revealing performance discrepancies and highlighting the potential of mid-sized models.

item.title: Web Agents with World Models: Learning and Leveraging Environment Dynamics in Web Navigation
item.description: Boosting web agents’ efficiency, new World-Model-Augmented agents simulate action outcomes, improving policy selection and outperforming tree-search methods.

item.title: Context is Key(NMF): Modelling Topical Information Dynamics in Chinese Diaspora Media
item.description: KeyNMF, a novel topic modeling approach using transformer embeddings, reveals how Chinese diaspora media’s information dynamics correlate with major Western political events, highlighting PRC narrativ…

item.title: Mini-Omni2: Towards Open-source GPT-4o with Vision, Speech and Duplex Capabilities
item.description: Mini-Omni2: Open-source multimodal model rivaling GPT-40’s vision, speech, text, and duplex interaction capabilities.

item.title: SHAKTI: A 2.5 Billion Parameter Small Language Model Optimized for Edge AI and Low-Resource Environments
item.description: Shakti: a resource-efficient 2.5B parameter language model excels in edge AI, enabling high-performance NLP on low-resource devices.

item.title: HART: Efficient Visual Generation with Hybrid Autoregressive Transformer
item.description: HART: A hybrid autoregressive transformer rivals diffusion models in 1024x1024 image generation quality while achieving significantly higher throughput and lower latency.
